Module Soft_Eng
Package loginFeat

Class XMLUser

java.lang.Object
loginFeat.XMLUser
public class XMLUser
extends java.lang.Object
Class that allows to manipulate the xml file of login informations. It allows to create the file, update it, and some more useful things.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Roman DIDELET, Jason KHAOU
